reviews.review:
Siendo sinceros, es uno de los mejores juegos que he jugado. Para ser un juego de puzzle tiene una muy buena historia que se desarrolla mÃ¡s en su secuela "Portal 2". El juego no dura mucho y lo puedes completar en 4 horas o menos, pero ofrece unas mecÃ¡nicas muy poco vistas e innovadoras para su Ã©poca. Cabe destacar que cualquier ordenador que sea de clase media o baja lo puede jugar.
En relaciÃ³n precio/tiempo no merece la pena, por eso yo recomiendo comprarlo de rebajas, ya sea el juego solo o bien con el pack completo de Valve. 
Un juego muy bueno que recomiendo jugar a todo videojugador.

One of the most impressive game mechanics of all time. I am actually still mind blown from it years after first discovering the game.

It's a very unique puzzle game with a captivating story, epic environment and interesting characters. The setting is quite strange and sci-fi, and can be disturbing at times â€“ some people with certain phobias might consider this a horror game. It all fits the whole theme perfectly.

There's literally no reason not to play it, unless you reeeally hate puzzle games.
Very good game! The adventure of Chell through Aperture is a very exciting story and no doubt Portal 2 made the story 10 times better.
Excellent puzzle game. Great game mechanics.

This was a triumph!
I'm making a note here:
Huge success!
It's hard to overstate
My satisfaction.
Aperture Science:
We do what we must
Because we can
For the good of all of us.
Except the ones who are dead.
But there's no sense crying
Over every mistake.
You just keep on trying
'Til you run out of cake.
And the science gets done.
And you make a neat gun
For the people who are
Still alive.
I'm not even angry...
I'm being so sincere right now.
Even though you broke my heart,
And killed me.
And tore me to pieces.
And threw every piece into a fire.
As they burned it hurt because
I was so happy for you!
Now, these points of data
Make a beautiful line.
And we're out of beta.
We're releasing on time!
So I'm GLaD I got burned!
Think of all the things we learned!
For the people who are
Still alive.
Go ahead and leave me...
I think I'd prefer to stay inside...
Maybe you'll find someone else
To help you.
Maybe Black Mesa?
That was a joke. Ha Ha. Fat Chance!
Anyway this cake is great!
It's so delicious and moist!
Look at me: still talking
When there's science to do!
When I look out there,
It makes me glad I'm not you.
I've experiments to run.
There is research to be done.
On the people who are
Still alive.
And believe me I am
Still alive.
I'm doing science and I'm
Still alive.
I feel fantastic and I'm
Still alive.
While you're dying I'll be
Still alive.
And when you're dead I will be
Still alive
Still alive.
Still alive.
Great game to pass time. Challenges are at a good difficulty, didn't take long to complete and narrative is very simple. Good puzzle game for people that don't like puzzle games.
it's good if you like speech to text women trying to kill suffocate you in neurotoxin, idk how to spell neurotoxin sorry :i.
If I finish this game, will I get the portal gun?

Mon dieu que dire de plus que jouez-y au moins une fois dans votre vie! Un vrai classique qui ne vieillis pas je viens tout juste de le refaire en 2022 et c'est toujours aussi bon et intelligent! 

[b]10/10[/b]

Ã€ faire absolument une fois dans votre vie!

Must-play if you like first-person puzzle games.
Must-play if you like puzzle games.
Must-play if you like games.
Must-play if you don't like games.

Just a timeless classic.

Duration: 2-4 hours. 
Also contains extra challenges to play after the main game.

A must buy. Portal is an incredible experience and has a great storyline complemented by exceptional level design. The puzzles are very well done and the developers managed to make them challenging enough while maintaining peak enjoyablility. There really isn't much else to say. You truely can't go wrong with this one. If you have some spare money to spend, purchasing this game is a no brainer.
